author: Kade Turner
comment: This app is awesome 🙂. There's one or two improvements that can be made (like adding a temperature converter with your other conversions, and a button on the graph screen to "lock" the screen in place so you can scroll on the graph, and maybe a feature that allows you to set the scale of the graph?), but the app is so awesome that it deserves 5 stars anyway 🤓.

This is probably the best free calculator for Android. There are no ads. I'm docking it one star since it says 1 BTC =~ 700 USD. It's off by more than $3000 as of 9/19/2017. Currency converter needs auto update.
This app doesn't go back before the year 1900.

author: DiScOrDaNt
comment: Best calculater app I've seen

author: joseph stein
comment: Best I found so far

author: Abir Hasan
comment: the best calculator app...

author: Ifaz Tauhid
comment: Good
Awesome app!

reply.author: Pain In My Processor
reply.content: Currencies are now auto-updated in the last update. Thanks!

author: Sunil Sherekar
comment: It's the most awesome calculator on Play store. Moreover, it's free. Thanks to the developers. You can support the development by a little donation.
title: Amazing....

author: Fábio Nunes
comment: I wanted to use this on my android wear, but unlike the phone app, the watch app is an extremely simplistic calculator with very basic options. Also after uninstalling the app on my phone, It did not uninstall from my watch.

author: Oscar Lewis
comment: I Ve never been a math head but I love this app maybe I can pick some of these  math problems up

author: Dylan Quigley
comment: And it is even better on Android wear
title: It's great calculator

author: Akin Akinsanya
comment: This is a good app that does what it was designed to do.
title: Great app and stable.

author: Govindan Jm
comment: It's one solution for calculations
title: Awesome

author: Rahul S.
comment: Best calculator ever!!!!!

author: Brian Villafan
comment: It's fast and correct.Helps me on my math tests when the teacher says no calculators allowed.I just pretend I am using my watch to tell time.😉
title: VERY HELPFULL

author: Ravi Ranjan Kumar
comment: Since you have stopped supporting paid version.. what about paid user now??

reply.author: Pain In My Processor
reply.content: There was no difference between free and paid versions except for ads. I have removed ads in free version and it made no sense to maintain two versions of the same app. Thank you for supporting development!!

title: What about paid user?

author: Case Macpherson
comment: Amazing calculator

author: Kartheek Reddy
comment: One of the best calculators for Android with attractive UI. Really a great piece of work.
title: Awesome

author: Samuel Valle
comment: Overall, this app does what it promises. Sadly, the smart watch app needs some serious work. Spacing between buttons is horrible, and if you have a round watchface(moto 360)  buttons at the bottom won't work most of the time because they are almost unreachable.

reply.author: Pain In My Processor
reply.content: Watch app has been fixed in this update. Check it out!!

title: Great phone app, horrible watch app.

author: Manny Kim
comment: The graph part of the calculator is not very useful. It's kind of clunky to use. But everything else is very solid and well polished. I love that it comes with its own unit converter.

author: Kamal Arief
comment: I'll give 5 stars or 100 stars (if i can) if you can convert float to binary or hex. It's such an important thing you know? Thank you. This app is the greatest calculator so far

reply.author: Pain In My Processor
reply.content: Programmer calculator converts float to binary, hex and oct.

title: Can't convert float to binary

author: Zach Emmons
comment: This is THE BEST PHONE CALCULATOR APP I'VE EVER SEEN AND IT'S FOR FREEEEEE=EE
title: W O W

author: Nick Hurst
comment: On the phone app I had no problem but the watch app needed a bit of a touch up, and a bit more functionality, also sometimes I tapped on a number/function and it wouldn't even pick it up but I was still OK with that but I updated my Moto 360 to marshmallow and now the watch app flickers really fast, like the screens turning on and off, but not, and I can't even press a button on it

reply.author: Pain In My Processor
reply.content: Watch app has been fixed in this update. Check it out!!

title: Good until I updated my watch

author: Scott Odle
comment: Ever since my Moto 360 2 upgraded to Marshmallow yesterday, the app background rapidly flashes between black and white.

reply.author: Pain In My Processor
reply.content: Wear app has been fixed in this update. Check it out!!

title: Screen flashes in Wear app

author: Egzon Pllana
comment: Best app for phone and watch. Really nice and unique design. Keep it up, you can do better and better. Congrats
title: Amazingly

comment: Just superb App. Only request is to add '00' (double zeros) keys in standard calculator for faster input of numbers and please also add '+/-' and a 'Root function' Keys which seems missing in standard cal.
title: Fantastic App

comment: Great app but there is a problem with widget...
